thread.section_title: Hotel Da Vinci & Spa - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely hotel
thread.title_full: Lovely hotel - Review of Hotel Da Vinci & Spa, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Lisa_Reviewer1
title: Lovely hotel
text:
A great location and a very clean and lovely hotel. Staff were generally very friendly.
We had an issue with our original room as it was in the eves and the headroom height was limited - our issue got sorted and we were moved to a room we preferred. Both rooms were very small but well laid out.
We used the spa which was very nice.
